noun.description: The quality of being only a short distance away or apart in space or time.
examples: the geographical closeness of our two countries
the translator's closeness to the original time period

noun.description: The quality of affection or intimacy in a relationship.
examples: moments of closeness with friends and family members

noun.description: The quality of being done in an attentive and thorough way.
examples: the closeness with which he watched current events
